com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.hdfs

Interface HDFSStoreMutator


  • public interface HDFSStoreMutator
    HDFSStoreMutator provides a means to dynamically alter HDFSStore's behavior. Instances of this interface are created using HDFSStore.createHdfsStoreMutator() and applied using HDFSStore.alter(com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.hdfs.HDFSStoreMutator)
